summary: Adds a new textured armor to craft.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#980000][size=6]Witcher 3 Style Armor[/size][/color]

Update 3: Got my new computer built and running and will hopefully be able to recover most of my assets. Planning on releasing an armor pack.

Update 2: My computer exploded. So yea...wont be any work coming out any time soon, sorry.

Update: As many of you have probably guessed, most of my free time will be devoted to playing the witcher 3. I will come back to this thats certain and maybe even get some more armor ideas.

[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=2]Obviously inspired by the up coming Witcher 3: Wild Hunt game I made a new armor to look similar to Geralt's armor we see in the trailers.
This is a simple retexture of the thieves guild armor as a stand alone armor type called "Leather Chainmail". I'm still new to texturing and this is mainly a learning process for me.[/size]

[color=#980000][size=4][b]Details:[/b][/size][/color]
ONLY available to male characters (at this time)

Leather Chainmail Armor:

Weight - 8
Base Armor - 31
Value - 225

Veteran's Armor:

Weight - 8
Base Armor - 35
Value - 300

[color=#980000][size=4][b]How To Obtain:[/b][/size][/color]
Both armors can be crafted at the forge under "Misc"

Materials required:

4 Leather
4 Leather strips
2 Iron Ingots 

Veterans armor requires 2 steel ingots.

[color=#980000][size=4][b]To Do:[/b][/size][/color]
Create a set
Create female version
Make a new texture for veterans armor
Make a complete retexture -almost done
Make 2K & 4K textures -done


Install: 
Place data folder in Skyrim directory

Uninstall:
delete "geralt3armor" files located in:
textures/armor/thievesguild/m
meshes/armor/thievesguild/m

delete the esp & bsa file for 4k version

[/font]v1.1 Update
-Can now upgrade armors
-2k res version
-4k res version
author: SpiderAkiraC
